 BlackFortress/Shivah
Shave had erased all old Paswords and set new passwords, with out that anyone could come in BlackFortres. Also, Shivah sent this message to Preborn thanks a secret frecuency, the message said  "report your current position"
 
  airly2000@... wrote: Shivah:

Shivah typed some buttons and checked all BF's passwords, soon the 
new paswords would be done and Any one could do to avoid it. he saw 
that 90% of the process had done... At least external doors are 
locked down with the new pasword and the main fuctions of 
BlackFortress has a new password too.

<P> BlackFortress/Shivah
<P>Shave had erased all old Paswords and set new passwords, with out that anyone could come in BlackFortres. Also, Shivah sent this message to Preborn thanks a secret frecuency, the message said  "report your current position"
<P> 
<P>  <B><I>airly2000@...</I></B> wrote:
